t: Amazon.com: Angelus Acrylic Leather Paint Gold 1oz
s: I normally buy my leather paints in person from a shop a couple towns away. This is the same brand, and it works really well. For the gold, I dilute a base color paint and mix in a bit of this to give a nice glitter effect.
